bio.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.fit3d.representations

Class BetaCarbonRepresentationScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.fit3d.representations.AbstractRepresentationScheme
      • bio.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.fit3d.representations.BetaCarbonRepresentationScheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepresentationScheme

    public class BetaCarbonRepresentationScheme
extends AbstractRepresentationScheme
    An implementation to represent a given LeafSubstructure by its beta carbon. This is only available for AminoAcids. For glycine a virtual beta carbon is calculated by superimposing alanine.
